basic.desc: A basic user record will be created in the Okta universal directory. The user will be authenticated immediately.

sfChatter.desc: A user record will be created in the Okta universal directory, and the user will be provisioned to Salesforce Chatter. User will be authenticated immediately.

withMFA.desc: A user record will be created in the Okta universal directory. An activation email will be sent to the user. The user must use a 2nd factor when they authenticate.

withEmail.desc: A user record will be created in the Okta universal directory. The user must verify their email address before they can authenticate.

withEmail.shortDesc: User must verify their email address

provisional.desc: A user will be created in an inactive state in the Okta universal directory. An admin must review the user record and manually activate (invite) the user.

provisional.shortDesc: User must be approved by admin

okta.desc: An Okta employee can register and get admin access (read-only) to the demo tenant. An Okta email address is required. MFA is also enforced for authentication.

okta.shortDesc: Okta users can register as an admin
